scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2015 browser module main
scripts.build-site: nx build --prod --project official-site && npm run generate-zen-docs
scripts.lib-vmajor: git stash && cd libs/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version major') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.lib-vminor: git stash && cd libs/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version minor') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.lib-vpatch: git stash && cd libs/angular-zen && (for /F %m in ('npm version patch') do git commit --all -m "Bumped library version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vmajor: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version major --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vminor: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version minor --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.app-vpatch: git stash && (for /F %m in ('npm version patch --no-git-tag-version') do git commit --all -m "Bumped workspace version to %m") && git stash pop
scripts.vmajor: npm run lib-vmajor && npm run app-vmajor
scripts.vminor: npm run lib-vminor && npm run app-vminor
scripts.vpatch: npm run lib-vpatch && npm run app-vpatch
scripts.generate-zen-docs: npm run update-wiki-summary -- ./wiki/angular-zen && cd libs/angular-zen && compodoc
scripts.serve-zen-docs: npm run update-wiki-summary -- ./wiki/angular-zen && cd libs/angular-zen && compodoc -s
